attributes.action: Close all shops on a Sunday.
attributes.additional_details: At this time, more than ever, we all need to stand together, work together, look after each other and extend our care to all those who are keeping the country 'ticking over'. A one-day closure would give vital rest time to those on whom we are depending on more than ever and show our national respect and gratitude for their dedication to meeting our nations needs.
attributes.background: Close all shops on a Sunday so that those working in our essential food and medical supply shops can have one day of rest.
